_comment: Example AI configuration file. Copy this to ai-config.json and update with your settings.
_comment2: This file is safe to commit to git as it contains no real API keys.

ollama._comment: Local AI models (free, requires Ollama installation)

openai._comment: OpenAI GPT models (requires OpenAI API key)

claude._comment: Claude models via direct API (requires Claude API key)

claude-openrouter._comment: Claude models via OpenRouter (requires OpenRouter API key)

openrouter._comment: Multiple models via OpenRouter (requires OpenRouter API key)

gemini._comment: Google Gemini models (requires Google AI API key)

_setup_instructions: 3. Update the configuration with your API keys
4. Or use the switch commands: sm-ollama, sm-claude, sm-openai, etc.
5. Test with: stressmaster 'GET 3 requests to https://httpbin.org/get'
